## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

## Build results
bin/
obj/
out/

## User-specific files
*.user
*.userosscache
*.suo
*.sln.docstates
.vscode/

## OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

## Rider
.idea/

## ASP.NET Core specific
appsettings.Development.json
appsettings.Local.json
appsettings.*.local.json
appsettings.*.Development.json
secrets.json

## Entity Framework
*.dbmdl
Migrations/

## Logs
*.log
logs/
log/

## Publish folder
publish/
*.publish.xml

## Test results
TestResults/
*.trx
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

## Resharper
_ReSharper*/
*.DotSettings.user

## NuGet
*.nupkg
.nuget/
packages/
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json

## Web files
node_modules/
bower_components/
wwwroot/lib/
.env

## Others
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
.vs/
